SiteNameAddress: Crossways Residential Care Home 306 Yorktown Road Sandhurst

SiteNameAddress: 77-79 Deepfield Road Bracknell
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Erection of 10 houses comprising 7no 3 bed and 2no 4 bed houses and 1 no 3 bed chalet bungalow at 77-79 Deepfield Road and land to the rear of 73-75 and 81-87 Deepfield Road and the creation of a new access road following demolition of 77 and 79.

SiteNameAddress: Tamar House Forth House and Clifton House Brants Bridge Bracknell
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority

SiteNameAddress: Land at Cricket Field Grove Crowthorne
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Erection of 130 dwellings with associated car parking, garaging, landscaping, informal open space and the formation of two new access points off the existing Cricket Field Grove. In addition, the creation of a publically accessible SANG facility and the provision of two Sports Pitches with associated parking and changing room facilities on land off Lower Broadmoor Road.

SiteNameAddress: The Blue Lion Broad Lane Bracknell
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Mixed use redevelopment comprising a retail unit (A1) and five flats (C3) (comprising five 2 bedroom units), together with associated plant, cycle and vehicle parking, refuse storage and landscaping following demolition of existing public house and outbuildings.

SiteNameAddress: Land At Sterling Court The Redwood Building and Chiltern House Broad Lane Bracknell
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Erection of 99 apartments (including affordable dwellings), provision of car parking and communal amenity space following demolition of existing office buildings.

SiteNameAddress: Land North of Peacock Lane Binfield
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Submission of details of layout, scale, appearance, access and landscaping for the erection of 128no. dwellings accessed from Peacock Lane with associated access roads, pedestrian and cycle links, car parking, landscaping (including drainage) and associated works pursuant to outline planning permission 98/00288/OUT (623523).

SiteNameAddress: Baileys Garage and The Haven Maidens Green Winkfield
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Erection of 5 dwellings following demolition of existing buildings.

SiteNameAddress: Racal House Eastern Road Bracknell
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Redevelopment of site to provide 60 residential units within a part-three, four and five storey building (plus basement car parking) with associated amenity space, landscaping, car parking, refuse stores and foot/cycle path link following demolition of existing buildings.

SiteNameAddress: Amber House & Northgate House Market Street Bracknell
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Erection of building accommodating 193no. residential apartments (use class C3) with flexible commercial use at ground level within use classes A1 (shops), A2 (financial and professional services), A3 (restaurants and cafes), B1 (business), D1 (non-residential institutions) and D2 (assembly and leisure) and associated car parking, amenity space, landscaping, servicing and access following the demolition of Amber House and Northgate House.

SiteNameAddress: Post Office 6 High Street Bracknell
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Erection of 7 storey building (with undercroft for parking/storage) accommodating A1 (retail) use at ground floor (170 sq m) and 14 residential units over following demolition of Post Office building

SiteNameAddress: Bridgewell Centre 10A Ladybank Bracknell

SiteNameAddress: Brackworth Broad Lane Bracknell
